dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 334 IH: Amending House Resolution 211 with respect to a national emergency declared by the President on February 1, 2025, and House Resolution 313 with respect to a national emergency declared by the President on April 2, 2025.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy of New York submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Rules

form.official-title: Amending House Resolution 211 with respect to a national emergency declared by the President on February 1, 2025, and House Resolution 313 with respect to a national emergency declared by the President on April 2, 2025.

section.header: Ensuring days occurring during first session constitute calendar days for purposes of joint resolution terminating a national emergency declared by the President on February 1, 2025

subsection.header: Treatment of days as calendar days
subsection.text: House Resolution 211, agreed to March 11, 2025, is amended by striking section 4.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as if included in the adoption of House Resolution 211.

section.header: Ensuring days occurring during first session constitute calendar days for purposes of joint resolution terminating a national emergency declared by the President on April 2, 2025

subsection.header: Treatment of days as calendar days
subsection.text: House Resolution 313, agreed to April 9, 2025, is amended by striking section 2.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as if included in the adoption of House Resolution 313.
